mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.`name`, sex, avatar, graduate_institution, specialization, graduate_date, birth, country, origo, address, home_telephone, office_telephone, mobile1, mobile2, email, entry_time, u.description, e.`name` education, d.`name` duty, r.`name` rank, sb.`name` `subject` FROM `s_user` u LEFT JOIN s_education e ON u.education=e.id LEFT JOIN s_duty d ON u.duty=d.id LEFT JOIN s_rank r ON u.rank=r.id LEFT JOIN s_subject sb ON u.subject_id=sb.id
WHERE u.id=#{id}
